title: The Freedom Convoy Continues to Trigger | Guests: Michael Malice & Heather Wilson | 2/11/22
description:
Glenn and Pat discuss the latest on the Canadian Freedom Convoy and the hits that keep coming from the Left, including the Canadian government seizing donations. President Biden got a little frustrated during an interview with NBC's Lester Holt. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss the news of the week, including Lester Holt’s interview with Biden, our economy, and how to fight the biggest threat facing our country. Author Michael Malice joins Glenn to discuss the Freedom Convoy, the redundancy of the Left's talking points, and Joe Rogan. Heather Wilson, co-founder of GiveSendGo, joins Glenn to discuss the Left and Canada’s attack on her company and donations seized by the Canadian government.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
